about_the_game:
Tensor is a first person action adventure game. The object of the game is to get from the beginning of the level to the end of the level, getting past all obstacles in the way, whether they be an environmental puzzle or enemy. It features multiple game modes and a few fun extras:

  • Campaign. Explore a series of hand-crafted levels that tell a story about an underground facility populated by Artificial Intelligences and robots. Encounter up to 9 enemy types. Collect up to 4 weapons along the way, plus environmental tools that can double as a weapon in a pinch (pick up and throw chairs at them!). Currently two story campaigns are available:

    • Campaign A: 4 Levels, 15-60 minutes of gameplay, depending on secret hunting.

    • Campaign B: 16 levels, 2-4 hours of gameplay, depending on secret hunting.

  • Survival. Get past waves of enemies to try to clear as many levels in one run as possible. Collect tokens from defeated enemies that can be traded for supplies and upgrades in order to keep going.

    • Randomized selection from a pool of 40 inventory and upgrade options, including 6 unique weapons, in order to survive an endless gauntlet of a randomized sequence of levels from a pool of 5 maps hand-crafted specifically for Survival, brimming with a randomized selection of up to 6 enemy types.

  • Versus. Connect with friends over a Local Area Network and compete in Death-match, Team Death-match, or Capture the Flag game modes. Comes with a Versus-only Level Editor to create your own Versus arenas!

  • Extras. For Advanced Users seeking truly endless replay value, check out the Level Editor and build your own levels!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains weapons-based violence against robots. Story themes may bring up uncomfortable philosophical questions.

detailed_description:
Tensor is a first person action adventure game. The object of the game is to get from the beginning of the level to the end of the level, getting past all obstacles in the way, whether they be an environmental puzzle or enemy. It features multiple game modes and a few fun extras:

  • Campaign. Explore a series of hand-crafted levels that tell a story about an underground facility populated by Artificial Intelligences and robots. Encounter up to 9 enemy types. Collect up to 4 weapons along the way, plus environmental tools that can double as a weapon in a pinch (pick up and throw chairs at them!). Currently two story campaigns are available:

    • Campaign A: 4 Levels, 15-60 minutes of gameplay, depending on secret hunting.

    • Campaign B: 16 levels, 2-4 hours of gameplay, depending on secret hunting.

  • Survival. Get past waves of enemies to try to clear as many levels in one run as possible. Collect tokens from defeated enemies that can be traded for supplies and upgrades in order to keep going.

    • Randomized selection from a pool of 40 inventory and upgrade options, including 6 unique weapons, in order to survive an endless gauntlet of a randomized sequence of levels from a pool of 5 maps hand-crafted specifically for Survival, brimming with a randomized selection of up to 6 enemy types.

  • Versus. Connect with friends over a Local Area Network and compete in Death-match, Team Death-match, or Capture the Flag game modes. Comes with a Versus-only Level Editor to create your own Versus arenas!

  • Extras. For Advanced Users seeking truly endless replay value, check out the Level Editor and build your own levels!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 Support
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2020
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 Support
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 Support
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 Support
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

name: Tensor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2, x86_64 CPU, ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 Support
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2, ARMv8 CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 Support
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Explore a strange facility of hostile robots while a friendly (?) robot (?) gives unhelpful suggestions.
